name: hm02
effect: Teaches Fly to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Fly to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: Flies up on the first turn, then attacks next turn.
flavor_text.emerald: Flies up on the first turn, then attacks next turn.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: A 2-turn move that hits on the 2nd turn. Use it to fly to any known town.
